## ValidationError type

Represents a validation error which is returned when validating an item.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ValidationError = {
    ErrorCode?: string;
    ExceptionName?: string;
    Location?: string;
    Message?: string;
    Source?: string;
};
```
